descriptions: AB Phylline N contains a combination of two medicines acebrophylline and acetylcysteine as its active ingredient. They belong to a class of bronchodilators and mucolytics, respectively. name: augmentin dds suspension
descriptions: Augmentin DDS suspension contains amoxicillin and clavulanic acid. Amoxicillin works by killing the bacteria responsible for infections. However, the bacteria make the enzyme (beta-lactamases) which c. Clavulanic acid inactivates this enzyme and hence helps Amoxicillin to perform its function....30 Nov 2021

name: asthakind expectorant sugar free

name: aciloc injection
use0: Treatment of Gastroesophageal reflux disease (Acid reflux)
descriptions: Aciloc Injection 5 x 2 ml contains Ranitidine, a histamine-2 (H2) receptor blocker that helps reduce stomach acid by blocking the actions of the H2 receptor. The H2 receptor lies in the parietal cells of the stomach wall, and it is responsible for gastric acid secretion.

name: alex p syrup
descriptions: INTRODUCTION. ALEX P SYRUP is a combination of Chlorpheniramine, Menthol, Paracetamol, Phenylephrine and Sodium Citrate which belongs to the group of medicines called Antihistamines, Cooling agents, Analgesics & Antipyretics, Nasal decongestant and Mucolytics respectively.20 Feb 2023

name: angicam-beta tablet
sideEffect3: Flushing (sense of warmth in the face, ears, neck and trunk)
descriptions: ANGICAM BETA TABLET contains two medicines namely amlodipine and atenolol. Atenolol blocks the effects of certain hormones (adrenaline) in the body that naturally increases heart rate. This slows down the heartbeat and makes the heart to pump blood with a lesser force. Amlodipine is a vasodilator.26 Feb 2024

name: allercet-m tablet
use0: Treatment of Sneezing and runny nose due to allergies
descriptions: Allercet-M Tablet is a combination of two medicines: Levocetirizine and Montelukast, which relieves sneezing and runny nose due to allergies.
